option.name: updatedContent
originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- Badminton App Colors --> <color name="primary_color">#4CAF50</color> <color name="primary_dark">#388E3C</color> <color name="accent_color">#FFC107</color> <color name="background_color">#F5F5F5</color> <color name="result_background">#E8F5E8</color> <color name="secondary_text_color">#757575</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources> <string name="app_name">BMApp</string> <string name="app_title">Badminton Fee Calculator</string> <string name="hint_number_of_players">Number of Players</string> <string name="hint_court_fees">Court Fees ($)</string> <string name="hint_shuttle_fees">Shuttle Fees ($)</string> <string name="btn_calculate">CALCULATE</string> <string name="result_total">Total Amount: $%.2f</string> <string name="result_per_player">Amount per player: $%.2f</string> <string name="result_total_placeholder">Total Amount: $0.00</string> <string name="result_per_player_placeholder">Amount per player: $0.00</string> <string name="error_empty_players">Please enter number of players</string> <string name="error_empty_court_fees">Please enter court fees</string> <string name="error_empty_shuttle_fees">Please enter shuttle fees</string> <string name="error_invalid_players">Number of players must be greater than 0</string> <string name="error_negative_fees">Fees cannot be negative</string> <string name="error_invalid_numbers">Please enter valid numbers</string> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.BMApp" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_500</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_700</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.BMApp" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/primary_color</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/primary_dark</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/white</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/accent_color</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/primary_dark</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>
